title: The Happy Life of Internet Celebrity Master Ye - Novel Updates
tags: Charming Protagonist   Feng Shui   Ghosts   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Special Abilities   Transmigration
author: Ke Qi   可期
description:
Ye Chuzhi woke up from the darkness and felt that the situation was not right. He remembered that he had died, and his soul had been inexplicably sealed in the jade pendant. Normally speaking, the soul shouldn’t have any sense. But how come he could feel that his mouth was full of blood now? And his whole body was in pain as if he had been beaten violently just now?

…Once waking up, Ye Chuzhi realized that he had turned from a master to a servant in a night club, and the one who favored the original body owner now wanted to punish him…>
